task:
Based on annotated cell types, how does the fraction of cells assigned to CN3 change over the ischemia–reperfusion injury time course?

A) Present at all timepoints with stable abundance
B) Absent during the mid-injury phase (hour 12 and day 2) and reappears during repair
C) Present only at 6 weeks post-injury
D) Restricted to the medulla at all timepoints with no temporal change

Return JSON: {"answer": "<letter>"}.
notes: Tests temporal dynamics of the CN3 neighborhood (PTS3-enriched domain) across IRI timepoints, not differential expression.
